name: Sprouting Out
description:
Rejuvenate the desert by guiding the roots through the earth. Make your way down earth's layers, grow faster by absorbing water, avoid obstacles, improve your time, and enjoy the beautiful watercolor art.

Built mobile first in Unity for Android, but available for web browser and Windows as well.

GitHub Repository: Out-For-Sprout on GitHub

Programming: Felix "Lonke" Berge, Christian "Jawsarn" Markowicz, Sofie "Vanilj" Bresäter

Art: Sofia Almqvist

UX / UI: Léa Dalla Zanna

Music & Audio design: David "Unofficial" Segal

Game design / Project management: Jakob "Copious" Ferenius
